label: Open when you miss me
content:
My love,

I know the distance feels heavy right now. Close your eyes and remember that I'm thinking about you too, at this exact moment. We're looking at the same moon, under the same sky.

Every kilometer between us is just proof of how strong our love is. You're worth every second of waiting.

I miss you more than words can say.

Forever yours,
[Your Name]

label: Open when you're sad
content:
Hey beautiful,

I wish I could be there to hold you right now. But since I can't, let me remind you:

You are stronger than you know. You are loved more than you realize. And whatever is making you sad right now? It's temporary.

You've got this. And you've got me.

Take a deep breath. Everything will be okay.

Love you always,
[Your Name]

label: Open when you can't sleep
content:
Can't sleep, my love?

Imagine I'm right there with you. We're cuddled up, I'm playing with your hair, telling you about my day.

You're safe. You're loved. Tomorrow is a new day full of possibilities.

Now close your eyes and dream of us.

Sweet dreams, my forever person.

[Your Name]

label: Open on Valentine's Day
content:
Happy Valentine's Day, my love!

Another Valentine's Day where I wish I could be holding your hand. But here we are, proving that love isn't about being in the same place ‚Äì it's about choosing each other, every single day.

I choose you today. I'll choose you tomorrow. And I'll keep choosing you forever.

Thank you for being my person.

I love you to the moon and back.

Yours forever,
